headline: Is Aflac Incorporated (AFL) the Best Stock to Invest In for Retirement?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 15 Best Stocks To Invest In For Retirement. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Aflac Incorporated (NYSE:AFL) stands against the other stocks.
